articles.description: The specimen shows that modern tuataras found in New Zealand are little changed from ancestors that lived 190 million years.
articles.content: Although its body was lizardlike, the structure of its skull resembled a tuatara. It sported similar rows of sharp, interlocking teeth extending directly from the jawbone. The skull also possessed tw… [+1992 chars]
